alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Columbus; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Bladen, southern Robeson, northwestern Columbus, central Florence, Dillon, Darlington, northwestern Horry, Marion and southern Marlboro Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 445 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Butters to near Floydale to near North Hartsville. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Lumberton, Hartsville, Marion, Dillon, Darlington, Whiteville, Mullins, Fairmont, Tabor City, Timmonsville, Chadbourn, Bladenboro, Latta, Pamplico, Lamar, Fair Bluff, Quinby, Lake View, and Sellers. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 125 and 141. Interstate 95 in South Carolina near mile marker 146, and between mile markers 148 and 198. Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 1 and 10, and between mile markers 12 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
